name: TcHmiVnImage
description: This description text will be used as a Tooltip in Visual Studio.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-bar-color
attributes.description: Color of the toolbar and infobar.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-shape-stroke-color
attributes.description: Color of shape strokes.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-shape-handle-color
attributes.description: Color of shape handles.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-image
attributes.description: Image to be displayed. Can be URL, file path or base64 string. Intended for use with ITcVnDisplayableImage symbols.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-image-list
attributes.description: Use this instead of Image property bind multiple image symbols. Select particular image using ImageIndex or ImageSelectionVisible.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-image-index
attributes.description: References image in ImageList that should be displayed. Unused for Image property.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-alt
attributes.description: This string will be displayed instead of an image, if no image is available.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-class-names
attributes.description: Defines the classes the control is part of. Can be addressed in themes.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-is-enabled
attributes.description: Only enabled controls will react on events.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-image-freeze
attributes.description: While true, new values in the ImageSource property won't update the displayed image. Use this to take a closer look at the current image.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-offset
attributes.description: Position of the displayed image relative to the control's top left corner.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-scale
attributes.description: Scale of displayed image relative to its standard size, specified by ScaleReference.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-scale-unit
attributes.description: Only Percent is allowed.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-scale-reference
attributes.description: Determines standard size of the image. If true, image is adjusted to the control's size. If false, image will be shown in original pixel size.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-draggable
attributes.description: While true, image can be moved by direct user input (drag'n'drop). Will update Offset.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-scalable
attributes.description: While true, image can be scaled by direct user input (two-finger pinching or mouse-wheel). Will update Offset and Size.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-scale-min
attributes.description: Minimum value for Scale.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-scale-max
attributes.description: Maximum value for Scale.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-scaling-center
attributes.description: How to adjust the offset when Scale is changed programmatically. ScalingBehavior is irrelevant for direct user input scaling.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-view
attributes.description: Viewing region of the image given by x, y, width, height in image coordinates.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-toolbar-visible
attributes.description: Displays a toolbar above the image which contains several controls for typical use cases.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-toolbar-items
attributes.description: Specifies, which items are shown in the toolbar.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-scale-options
attributes.description: List of Zoom Levels to select from.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-toolbar-height
attributes.description: Height of the toolbar.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-toolbar-height-unit
attributes.description: Only Pixel is allowed.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-image-selection-width
attributes.description: Width of the ImageSelection combobox.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-image-selection-width-unit
attributes.description: Only Pixel is allowed.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-scale-selection-width
attributes.description: Width of the ScalingSelection combobox.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-scale-selection-width-unit
attributes.description: Only Pixel is allowed.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-scale-selection-editable
attributes.description: Individual scale values can be put into the ScaleSelection combobox.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-infobar-visible
attributes.description: Displays an infobar below the image which contains specific information about the image.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-infobar-items
attributes.description: Specifies, which items are shown in the infobar.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-pixel-color-format

requiredArguments.description: Color values of the selected pixel.

attributes.description: Formatting function for the PixelColor to be displayed in the Infobar.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-shape-value-format

requiredArguments.description: Geometric description of the shape. Description is shape-specific.

attributes.description: Height of the infobar.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-infobar-height
attributes.description: Height of the infobar.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-infobar-height-unit
attributes.description: Only Pixel is allowed.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-shape-selection-active
attributes.description: While true, a shape can be selected by the user by clicking/drawing on the image. Resulting box is returned by Box Array. Other user input is blocked, while shape selection is active.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-shape-type
attributes.description: Type of the shape.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-shape-is-rotatable
attributes.description: Whether the shape is rotatable.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-shape-data
attributes.description: Symbol for the data representing a drawn shape.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-shape-auto-clear
attributes.description: Clears ShapeData when shape selection is deactivated.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-shape-stroke-thickness
attributes.description: Stroke Thickness.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-shape-stroke-thickness-unit
attributes.description: Only Pixel is allowed.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-shape-handle-size
attributes.description: Handle size.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-shape-handle-size-unit
attributes.description: Only Pixel is allowed.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-shape-clickable-size
attributes.description: Size of clickable, but transparent area around handles.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-shape-clickable-size-unit
attributes.description: Only Pixel is allowed.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-shape-angle-interval
attributes.description: Interval of allowed rotation angles (in degrees).

attributes.name: data-tchmi-shape-is-in-image-area
attributes.description: Shows, whether the shape (given by ShapeData) is entirely inside the area of the current image.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-thumbnail-visible
attributes.description: Shows a map indicating current view region in relation to whole image.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-thumbnail-position
attributes.description: Position of the image preview.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-thumbnail-size
attributes.description: Width of the image thumbnail (in [px]). Height will be set automatically based on image ratio.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-thumbnail-size-unit
attributes.description: Only Pixel is allowed.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-overlay-visible
attributes.description: Show OverlayImage and OverlayElements.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-overlay-image
attributes.description: Image Source to display above main image.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-overlay-elements
attributes.description: Aid elements like a crosshair cursor.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-pixel-info-update
attributes.description: For which pixel to show information (color + position). 'AtCursor' might cause delays on slower systems.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-image-size
attributes.description: Original size of the image.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-image-display-size
attributes.description: Original size of the image.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-pixel-position
attributes.description: Position of last clicked pixel in image coordinates.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-pixel-color
attributes.description: Color of last clicked pixel in RGBA format.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-queue-index
attributes.description: Index to image to be displayed. Provide 0 for live image.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-queue-size
attributes.description: Number of past images to be stored in queue. FIFO applies.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-averaging-interval
attributes.description: Number of past events, that averages will be calculated for. Applies to ImageRate, DataRate and ImageRenderTime.

attributes.name: data-tchmi-image-rate
attributes.description: Average rate of image retrieval in this control (in images per second).

attributes.name: data-tchmi-images-received
attributes.description: Total number of images received in this control (since last reset).

attributes.name: data-tchmi-data-rate
attributes.description: Average rate of data received in this control (in byte per second).

attributes.name: data-tchmi-data-received
attributes.description: Total amount of data received in this control (since last reset).

attributes.name: data-tchmi-image-render-time
attributes.description: Average time it takes to render the received image on screen (in milliseconds).

attributeCategories.name: View
attributeCategories.description: Size and position of the displayed image.

attributeCategories.name: Toolbar
attributeCategories.description: Determine, which UI elements appear for this control.

attributeCategories.name: Infobar
attributeCategories.description: Determine, which UI elements appear for this control.

attributeCategories.name: Shapes
attributeCategories.description: User selects a region in the image.

attributeCategories.name: Thumbnail
attributeCategories.description: Determine, which UI elements appear for this control.

attributeCategories.name: Info
attributeCategories.description: Get information about last clicked pixel.

attributeCategories.name: History
attributeCategories.description: Store past images + bring them back into view.

attributeCategories.name: Diagnostics
attributeCategories.description: Get diagnostic information about this controls.

functions.name: fitImageToControl
functions.description: Adjust scale and offset so that image perfectly fits into control.

params.name: center
params.description: If true, image will be centered. If false, image will appear in top left corner.

functions.name: centerImageToControl
functions.description: Adjust offset so that image is centered in control.

functions.name: setView
functions.description: Set a specific view in image coordinates. Will change Offset and Scale properties.

params.name: view
params.description: View as [X, Y, Width, Height] in image coordinates.

functions.name: clearShape
functions.description: Clears the shape array and erases shape from image.

functions.name: downloadImage
functions.description: Saves currently displayed image to a file (browser download).

params.name: fileName
params.description: Name to store image file as.

functions.name: resetDataReceived
functions.description: Set counter of received data bytes to 0.

functions.name: resetImagesReceived
functions.description: Set counter of received images to 0.

events.name: .onPixelInfo
events.description: This event is raised if specific pixel is clicked.

events.name: .onShapeConfirmed
events.description: This event is raised if the shape was changed.

events.name: .onImageReceived
events.description: This event is raised an image was received (independent from FreezeCurrent).

themedResources.name: ImageSelection_FontFamily
themedResources.description: Comma-separated list of fonts as font family or keyword: 'serif', 'sans-serif', 'monospace'.

themedResources.name: ImageSelection_FontSize
themedResources.description: The font size.

themedResources.name: ImageSelection_FontStyle
themedResources.description: Font style (normal, italic: oblique with special characters, oblique).

themedResources.name: ImageSelection_FontWeight
themedResources.description: Font weight (normal, bold).

themedResources.name: ImageSelection_HorizontalAlignment
themedResources.description: Horizontal alignment of the text.

themedResources.name: ImageSelection_ContentPadding
themedResources.description: Defines the distance of the text to the border.

themedResources.name: ImageSelection_MaxListHeight
themedResources.description: Defines the height of the combo box.

themedResources.name: ImageSelection_DropDownFontFamily
themedResources.description: Comma-separated list of fonts as font family or keyword: 'serif', 'sans-serif', 'monospace'.

themedResources.name: ImageSelection_DropDownFontSize
themedResources.description: The font size.

themedResources.name: ImageSelection_DropDownFontStyle
themedResources.description: Font style (normal, italic: oblique with special characters, oblique)

themedResources.name: ImageSelection_DropDownFontWeight
themedResources.description: Font weight (normal, bold).

themedResources.name: ImageSelection_DropDownStyle
themedResources.description: Defines the position of the drop-down menu. Desktop or Mobile.

themedResources.name: ImageSelection_DataHeight
themedResources.description: Defines the height of drop-down menu items.

themedResources.name: ScaleSelection_FontFamily
themedResources.description: Comma-separated list of fonts as font family or keyword: 'serif', 'sans-serif', 'monospace'.

themedResources.name: ScaleSelection_FontSize
themedResources.description: The font size.

themedResources.name: ScaleSelection_FontStyle
themedResources.description: Font style (normal, italic: oblique with special characters, oblique).

themedResources.name: ScaleSelection_FontWeight
themedResources.description: Font weight (normal, bold).

themedResources.name: ScaleSelection_HorizontalAlignment
themedResources.description: Horizontal alignment of the text.

themedResources.name: ScaleSelection_ContentPadding
themedResources.description: Defines the distance of the text to the border.

themedResources.name: ScaleSelection_MaxListHeight
themedResources.description: Defines the height of the combo box.

themedResources.name: ScaleSelection_DropDownFontFamily
themedResources.description: Comma-separated list of fonts as font family or keyword: 'serif', 'sans-serif', 'monospace'.

themedResources.name: ScaleSelection_DropDownFontSize
themedResources.description: The font size.

themedResources.name: ScaleSelection_DropDownFontStyle
themedResources.description: Font style (normal, italic: oblique with special characters, oblique)

themedResources.name: ScaleSelection_DropDownFontWeight
themedResources.description: Font weight (normal, bold).

themedResources.name: ScaleSelection_DropDownStyle
themedResources.description: Defines the position of the drop-down menu. Desktop or Mobile.
